Composition Map

So above Iâ€™m posting a PDF image of a thought map I created to aid my study for Qualifying Exams this October. It essentially marks some of the major movements of composition, starting with the teaching of speech and composition in English through some contemporary post-process theory.

This map is skeletal, obviously, in that I cannot hope to cover the entirety of comp theory in one document (or by myself). however, this is a start, I think, and any suggestions as to the expansion of the map, or the filling of holes in the map, or additional sources for the map, are welcome.
